message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. Hope you agree!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy! Time is money, after all.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40.  It's a fair deal considering the inflation.
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is more than fair considering the time pressure.
Let's be realistic now - we're both losing money with each passing round. A 50/50 split is the only way we both get something decent. What do you say?
